metadata.name: Traveltiger.eth Certificate Of Completion
metadata.description:
This certificate is proudly presented to Traveltiger.eth, in recognition of his hard work and dedication in completing the "Private Trading Masterclass", from August 17, 2020 to January 18, 2021 under the mentorship of Arshia Zojaji in accordance with all requirements of graduation by Honest Crypto.

Each certificate NFT has minter's name on it. We've used ERC721 standard to create 1 of 1 NFT to keep each certificate 100% unique.
